mapper.select: SELECT DbT5123Nintei."ninteichosaIraiYoteiYMD" AS "DbT5123Nintei_ninteichosaIraiYoteiYMD", DbT5123Nintei."ninteichosaYoteiYMD" AS "DbT5123Nintei_ninteichosaYoteiYMD", DbT5123Nintei."ikenshoSakuseiIraiYoteiYMD" AS "DbT5123Nintei_ikenshoSakuseiIraiYoteiYMD", DbT5123Nintei."ikenshoTorokuYoteiYMD" AS "DbT5123Nintei_ikenshoTorokuYoteiYMD", DbT5123Nintei."ichijiHanteiYoteiYMD" AS "DbT5123Nintei_ichijiHanteiYoteiYMD", DbT5123Nintei."ninteiShinsakaiWariateYoteiYMD" AS "DbT5123Nintei_ninteiShinsakaiWariateYoteiYMD", DbT5123Nintei."ninteiShinsakaiYoteiYMD" "DbT5123Nintei_ninteiShinsakaiYoteiYMD", DbT5105Nintei."ninteichosaIraiKanryoYMD" AS "DbT5105Nintei_ninteichosaIraiKanryoYMD", DbT5105Nintei."ninteichosaKanryoYMD" AS "DbT5105Nintei_ninteichosaKanryoYMD", DbT5105Nintei."ikenshoSakuseiIraiKanryoYMD" AS "DbT5105Nintei_ikenshoSakuseiIraiKanryoYMD", DbT5105Nintei."ikenshoTorokuKanryoYMD" AS "DbT5105Nintei_ikenshoTorokuKanryoYMD", DbT5105Nintei."ichijiHanteiKanryoYMD" AS "DbT5105Nintei_ichijiHanteiKanryoYMD", DbT5105Nintei."maskingKanryoYMD" AS "DbT5105Nintei_maskingKanryoYMD", DbT5105Nintei."ninteiShinsakaiWariateKanryoYMD" AS "DbT5105Nintei_ninteiShinsakaiWariateKanryoYMD", DbT5105Nintei."ninteiShinsakaiKanryoYMD" AS "DbT5105Nintei_ninteiShinsakaiKanryoYMD", DbT5101Nintei."ninteiShinseiYMD" AS "DbT5101Nintei_ninteiShinseiYMD", DbT5101Nintei."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" AS "DbT5101Nintei_ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode", DbT5101Nintei."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode", DbT4102Nintei."nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode" AS "DbT4102Nintei_nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode", DbT4102Nintei."nijiHanteiNinteiYukoKaishiYMD" AS "DbT4102Nintei_nijiHanteiNinteiYukoKaishiYMD", DbT4102Nintei."nijiHanteiNinteiYukoShuryoYMD" AS "DbT4102Nintei_nijiHanteiNinteiYukoShuryoYMD", DbT4102Nintei."nijiHanteiNinteiYukoKikan" AS "DbT4102Nintei_nijiHanteiNinteiYukoKikan", DbT5101Nintei."shienShinseiKubun" AS "DbT5101Nintei_shienShinseiKubun", DbT5101Nintei."nigoTokuteiShippeiCode" AS "DbT5101Nintei_nigoTokuteiShippeiCode", DbT5101Nintei."johoteikyoDoiFlag" AS "DbT5101Nintei_johoteikyoDoiFlag", DbT4116Ichiji."ichijiHanteiKekkaCode" AS "DbT4116Ichiji_ichijiHanteiKekkaCode", DbT5511Shinsa."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD" AS "DbT5511Shinsa_shinsakaiKaisaiYMD", DbT5101Nintei."shoriJotaiKubun" AS "DbT5101Nintei_shoriJotaiKubun" FROM rgdb."DbT5123NinteiKeikakuJoho" AS DbT5123Nintei INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" AS DbT5101Nintei ON DbT5101Nintei."shinseishoKanriNo" = DbT5123Nintei."shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5105NinteiKanryoJoho" AS DbT5105Nintei ON DbT5105Nintei."shinseishoKanriNo" = DbT5123Nintei."shinseishoKanriNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT4102NinteiKekkaJoho" AS DbT4102Nintei ON DbT4102Nintei."shinseishoKanriNo" = DbT5123Nintei."shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT4116IchijiHanteiKekkaJoho" AS DbT4116Ichiji ON DbT4116Ichiji."shinseishoKanriNo" = DbT5123Nintei."shinseishoKanriNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5511ShinsakaiKaisaiKekkaJoho" AS DbT5511Shinsa ON DbT5511Shinsa."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = DbT4102Nintei."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" WHERE DbT5123Nintei."shinseishoKanriNo"=#{shinseishoKanriNo}
